data.comment: The big names in today's match at Ilha do Retiro have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Recife PE.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Rafinha of Coritiba gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Recife PE throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 5, In Recife Recife PE attack through Ronaldo. The finish is off target, however.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Recife PE have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 9, Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Recife PE capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick Coritiba.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 14, Recife PE will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Coritiba.
Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Recife.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Recife PE's area.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 16, Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Recife to check on Adryelson, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 17, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ricardo Oliveira.
Adryelson is back on his feet again.
Coritiba's Ricardo Oliveira is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 19, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Recife PE are pushing forward but Iago Maidana's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Coritiba at Ilha do Retiro.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 21, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Coritiba's Robson has been booked in Recife.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
In Recife, Marquinhos of Recife PE is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Recife PE are coming forward and Marcao Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 26, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
In the minute 28, Recife PE's Thiago Neves misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 29, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba's Mailton misses with an attempt on goal.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Coritiba.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 38, Goal! Thiago Neves gives Recife PE a 1-0 lead.
Patric with an assist there.
Recife PE pushes forward through Lucas Mugni, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 41, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 44, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Marcelo De Lima Henrique will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Sabino of Coritiba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Marcelo De Lima Henrique blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Neilton is on a sub for Matheus Bueno for Coritiba.
In the minute 46, Rodrigo Santana (Coritiba) is making a second substitution, with Yan Sasse replacing Robson.
Great shot from Coritiba's Rhodolfo but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 47, Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba's Yan Sasse is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Coritiba.
Recife PE's Patric gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 51, Recife PE push forward at Ilha do Retiro and Marquinhos gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Coritiba defence.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Recife PE throw-in in Coritiba's half.
In the minute 52, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Marquinhos fires in a strike for Recife PE.
In the minute 54, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Recife PE throw-in in Coritiba's half.
In the minute 57, Recife PE are in shooting range from this free kick.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Recife PE push forward at Ilha do Retiro and Thiago Neves gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Coritiba defence.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Recife PE push forward at Ilha do Retiro and Lucas Mugni gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Coritiba defence.
Yan Sasse (Coritiba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 64, Ricardo Oliveira for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 66, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match at Ilha do Retiro has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marquinhos, who is down injured.
In the minute 71, Coritiba are pushing forward but Giovanni Augusto's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
Raul Prata is replacing Lucas Mugni for the home team.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Recife PE.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 72, Recife PE make their second substitution with Betinho replacing Ronaldo.
Marquinhos returns to the field for Recife PE after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 74, Recife PE’s Iago Maidana is on his feet again at Ilha do Retiro.
Coritiba's Rafinha looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 74, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Iago Maidana for Recife PE who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Rafinha is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Dalberto's header is off-target for Recife PE.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Coritiba at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE push upfield and Dalberto gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Coritiba defence.
Coritiba drives forward and Neilton gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It seems as if Rafinha is unable to continue. Osman replaces him for the away team.
Junior Tavares of Recife PE smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 78, Recife PE are coming forward and Patric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 79, Coritiba's Mattheus gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ricardo Oliveira for Coritiba drives towards goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Dalberto (Recife PE) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Raul Prata gets his shot on target but fails to score for Recife PE.
In the minute 82, Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Recife.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 84, Luciano Batista (Recife PE) has replaced the possibly injured Marquinhos.
The home team have replaced Thiago Neves with Jonathan Gomez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jair Ventura.
Coritiba's Mailton gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rodrigo Santana is making the team's fourth substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Jonathan replacing Giovanni Augusto.
Pablo Thomaz is replacing Hugo Moura for Coritiba at Ilha do Retiro.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Recife PE.
Can Recife PE capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Free kick Coritiba.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 89, Jair Ventura (Recife PE) is making a fifth substitution, with Mikael replacing Dalberto.
Iago Maidana (Recife PE) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Coritiba throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Important block from the Recife PE defence as Neilton fires in a strike for Coritiba.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Coritiba throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba's Ricardo Oliveira is on target but unsuccessful.
In Recife, Mattheus of Coritiba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Recife PE's Mikael breaks free at Ilha do Retiro. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Ilha do Retiro.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
